data.text:
Haa, haa…… T-time…… 
Aww, it's no different from before……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Let's take a break. Do you remember what I said?
choices.processed: <size=33>Let's take a break. Do you remember what I said?</size>

data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa…… T-time…… 
<story>Aww, it's no different from before……!

data.text:
Ah, um…… that I'm too anxious and rushing things, right? 
I'm pushing myself too much and ruining my form.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Yeah. For now, don't worry about time
choices.processed: <size=43>Yeah. For now, don't worry about time</size>

choices.text: Yeah. For now, don't worry about time
choices.processed: <size=43>Yeah. For now, don't worry about time</size>

data.processed:
<story>Ah, um…… that I'm too anxious and rushing things, right? 
<story>I'm pushing myself too much and ruining my form.

data.text:
For now, I wanted her to run calmly without rushing. Mentally and 
physically, I wanted to reduce the load on her training――
data.processed:
<story>For now, I wanted her to run calmly without rushing. Mentally and 
<story>physically, I wanted to reduce the load on her training――

data.text:
So I can remember my form from before my injury…… 
Right? I-I'll do my best……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Let's not rush and build up gradually!

data.processed:
<story>So I can remember my form from before my injury…… 
<story>Right? I-I'll do my best……!

data.text: ……Yeah!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……Yeah!

data.text:
The current Zenno Rob Roy couldn't really 
assess her own abilities. For now, if she 
could just start believing in herself……!
data.processed:
<story>The current Zenno Rob Roy couldn't really 
<story>assess her own abilities. For now, if she 
<story>could just start believing in herself……!

data.text: A few days later――
data.processed: <story>A few days later――

data.text:
(For some reason, my body feels light……? 
Even though lately, I've just been running however I felt like……)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(For some reason, my body feels light……? 
<story>Even though lately, I've just been running however I felt like……)

data.text:
(……yeah, that's right. It's fine not to rush. 
Trainer-san believes in my strength after all.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(……yeah, that's right. It's fine not to rush. 
<story>Trainer-san believes in my strength after all.)

data.text:
(That's why, me too…… I need to believe in myself 
at least as much as Trainer-san does……!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(That's why, me too…… I need to believe in myself 
<story>at least as much as Trainer-san does……!)

data.text: I'm fine……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>I'm fine……!

data.text:
……A few days before the Sports Festival, in the library. Zenno 
Rob Roy was reviewing material related to the 『Hero Search』.
data.processed:
<story>……A few days before the Sports Festival, in the library. Zenno 
<story>Rob Roy was reviewing material related to the 『Hero Search』.

data.text:
……There's no mistaking it. Trainer-san said she wasn't but…… 
as I thought, Kris S-san is our Hero.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……There's no mistaking it. Trainer-san said she wasn't but…… 
<story>as I thought, Kris S-san is our Hero.

data.text:
At this time, on this course, on that date. 
No matter how you look at this data, there's only Kris S-san……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>At this time, on this course, on that date. 
<story>No matter how you look at this data, there's only Kris S-san……

data.text: ……This information…… I don't…… want to tell them……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……This information…… I don't…… want to tell them……

data.text:
(But, I have to. At the Sports Festival, I'll compete 
against Kris S-san and lose…… and then I'll tell 
them everything and put this to an end.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(But, I have to. At the Sports Festival, I'll compete 
<story>against Kris S-san and lose…… and then I'll tell 
<story>them everything and put this to an end.)

data.text: (That's why, until then……)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(That's why, until then……)

data.text:
And so, the day of the Sports Festival arrived! 
Zenno Rob Roy was――
data.processed:
<story>And so, the day of the Sports Festival arrived! 
<story>Zenno Rob Roy was――

data.text:
(N-no way! No way……! Why today, 
of all days, did I have a late start……!?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(N-no way! No way……! Why today, 
<story>of all days, did I have a late start……!?)

data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>……

data.text:
(Kris S-san's back, is getting further and further away…… 
at this rate, I won't even be able to see it anymore)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Kris S-san's back, is getting further and further away…… 
<story>at this rate, I won't even be able to see it anymore)

data.text:
(…… As I thought, I can't win. There was no way 
I could win. Even with all that training we did……)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(…… As I thought, I can't win. There was no way 
<story>I could win. Even with all that training we did……)

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: You're the main character, Rob Roy!!
You're the main character, Rob Roy!!

data.processed: <story>……！！

data.text: (I…… I'm the main character?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(I…… I'm the main character?)

data.text:
(If I do win against Kris S-san, what will happen? 
Will my story start then? If it does――)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(If I do win against Kris S-san, what will happen? 
<story>Will my story start then? If it does――)

data.text:
(Even after the Sports Festival, and after we 
find our hero. Will Trainer-san still want to 
see the story of me being the main character?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Even after the Sports Festival, and after we 
<story>find our hero. Will Trainer-san still want to 
<story>see the story of me being the main character?)

data.text: (I want them to……!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(I want them to……!)

data.text: Ha――aaaaa!!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Ha――aaaaa!!

data.text:
What's this, Zenno Rob Roy starts to pull forward here! But in 
the final straight, Symboli Kris S is still far ahead!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>What's this, Zenno Rob Roy starts to pull forward here! But in 
<story>the final straight, Symboli Kris S is still far ahead!

data.text:
(Watch me, Trainer-san. 
As the only reader of my Heroic Tale……!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Watch me, Trainer-san. 
<story>As the only reader of my Heroic Tale……!)

data.text:
The main character…… is me!! 
Taaaaaaaaーーーー!!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>The main character…… is me!! 
<story>Taaaaaaaaーーーー!!

data.text:
I finally realized. It was a strong, wild, and desperate run. 
But filled with pride―― just like the Hero I saw that day!
data.processed:
<story>I finally realized. It was a strong, wild, and desperate run. 
<story>But filled with pride―― just like the Hero I saw that day!

data.text: Haa, haa, haa…… haaaaa!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa…… haaaaa!

data.text: ――So you've made it this far.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――So you've made it this far.

data.text:
Symboli Kris S accelerates tremendously before 
the goal! Faster, and faster! As expected, today's 
main character is none other than her!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Symboli Kris S accelerates tremendously before 
<story>the goal! Faster, and faster! As expected, today's 
<story>main character is none other than her!

data.text:
And now she crosses first! 
Symboli Kris S wins handily!!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>And now she crosses first! 
<story>Symboli Kris S wins handily!!

data.text:
There was a thunderous applause and cheering coming from the 
spectators. Of course―― it was intended for the victor.
data.processed:
<story>There was a thunderous applause and cheering coming from the 
<story>spectators. Of course―― it was intended for the victor.

data.text:
(…… I lost…… I thought so. Things wouldn't be that easy. 
That's why I need to say it. I need to give up on that.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(…… I lost…… I thought so. Things wouldn't be that easy. 
<story>That's why I need to say it. I need to give up on that.)

data.text:
……Trainer-san! 
Um, I know who that Hero―
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……Trainer-san! 
<story>Um, I know who that Hero―

data.text: You were―― huh?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>You were―― huh?

data.text:
Eh? W-what do you mean by that!? 
Why are you bring that up all of a sudden……!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Eh? W-what do you mean by that!? 
<story>Why are you bring that up all of a sudden……!?

data.text: Rob Roy, about that race―― oh, are you preoccupied?
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>Rob Roy, about that race―― oh, are you preoccupied?

data.text:
Ah, Kris S-san! You came at just the right time, 
there's something I want to ask you……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah, Kris S-san! You came at just the right time, 
<story>there's something I want to ask you……!

data.text:
――And so, on this day at around 4PM! 
You were using the outside turf course, right……!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>――And so, on this day at around 4PM! 
<story>You were using the outside turf course, right……!?

data.text: ――Yes.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――Yes.

data.text:
With you―― we were practicing together. 
About the time―― I'm not sure――
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>With you―― we were practicing together. 
<story>About the time―― I'm not sure――

data.text:
S-see!? I saw it with my own eyes too! 
There's no mistaking that the Hero was Kris S-san!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Hold on, if you were practicing together……
choices.processed: <size=38>Hold on, if you were practicing together……</size>

data.processed:
<story>S-see!? I saw it with my own eyes too! 
<story>There's no mistaking that the Hero was Kris S-san!

data.text: ――Rob Roy was there too.
data.name: Symboli Kris S

choices.text: Did you have your hair tied back?

data.processed: <story>――Rob Roy was there too.

data.text: Yeah…… I think so.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: And you almost tripped and fell?

data.processed: <story>Yeah…… I think so.

data.text:
How come you even saw that!? 
So then…… then that means…… eeeh!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>How come you even saw that!? 
<story>So then…… then that means…… eeeh!?

data.text: Eh――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Eh――

data.text: ……Eeeeeeh!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……Eeeeeeh!?

data.text: ――I see, so you ARE preoccupied.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――I see, so you ARE preoccupied.

data.text:
I see. After that I was injured so I couldn't run much, 
and you couldn't tell that that Hero was me……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I see. After that I was injured so I couldn't run much, 
<story>and you couldn't tell that that Hero was me……

data.text:
……that's surprising. 
So from the start you…… were watching me then.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……that's surprising. 
<story>So from the start you…… were watching me then.

data.text:
……I said it before, right? A heroic tale becomes a 
heroic tale when it starts being told as a hero's story.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……I said it before, right? A heroic tale becomes a 
<story>heroic tale when it starts being told as a hero's story.

data.text:
That's why, Trainer-san! I'll do my best. From now on, 
I'll make sure you're the one that wants to tell this story.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>That's why, Trainer-san! I'll do my best. From now on, 
<story>I'll make sure you're the one that wants to tell this story.

data.text:
Together, we'll finish this story. 
『The Heroic Tale of Zenno Rob Roy』 ……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Together, we'll finish this story. 
<story>『The Heroic Tale of Zenno Rob Roy』 ……!

data.text:
She was smiling as she said that. 
And that was the prologue of this long and heroic story.
data.processed:
<story>She was smiling as she said that. 
<story>And that was the prologue of this long and heroic story.

title: The Beginning Of A Story For You
